entities.name: Appbar
entities.description:
The top app bar provides content and actions related to the current screen. It's used for branding, screen titles, navigation, and actions.

It can transform into a contextual action bar.}}

languages.dart:
AppBar(

    tooltip: 'Open Drawer',
    onPressed: () {},
  ),
  title: const Text('Title'),
  actions: <Widget>[

      icon: const Icon(Icons.download_sharp),
      tooltip: 'Download',
      onPressed: () {},
    ),
    IconButton(
      icon: const Icon(Icons.print),
      tooltip: 'Print',
      onPressed: () {},
    ),
    IconButton(
      icon: const Icon(Icons.favorite),
      tooltip: 'Favorite',
      onPressed: () {},

  ],
)

entities.name: Card
entities.description: Cards contain content and actions about a single subject.}}

languages.dart:
Card(
  child: Column(
    children: [
      ListTile(
        leading: CircleAvatar(),
        title: Text('Title goes here'),
        subtitle: Text('Secondary text'),
      ),
      Container(
        height: 200,
        child: Placeholder(),
      ),
      Padding(
        padding: const EdgeInsets.all(16),
        child: Text(
          'Greyhound divisively hello coldly wonderfully marginally far upon excluding.',
          style: Theme.of(context).textTheme.caption,
        ),
      ),
      Row(
        children: [
          FlatButton(
            child: Text('ACTION 1'),
            textColor: Theme.of(context).primaryColor,
            onPressed: () {},
          ),
          FlatButton(
            child: Text('ACTION 2'),
            textColor: Theme.of(context).primaryColor,
            onPressed: () {},
          ),
          Spacer(),
          IconButton(
            icon: Icon(Icons.favorite),
            onPressed: () {},
          ),
          IconButton(
            icon: Icon(Icons.share),
            onPressed: () {},
          ),

      ),
    ],
  ),
)
languages.html: Title
languages.angular:
Shiba Inu Dog Breed

The Shiba Inu is the smallest of the six original and distinct spitz breeds of dog from Japan. A small, agile dog that copes very well with mountainous terrain, the Shiba Inu was originally bred for hunting.

entities.name: FAB
entities.description: A floating action button is a circular icon button that hovers over content to promote a primary action in the application.}}

languages.html:
<mwc-fab icon='edit'></mwc-fab>

<script type='module'>
    import '@material/mwc-fab';
    const fab = document.querySelector('mwc-fab');
    fab.addEventListener('click', () => {
        edit();
    });
</script>
languages.angular:
<button mat-fab color="primary" aria-label="Example icon button with a heart icon">
  <mat-icon>favorite</mat-icon>
  </button>
